alert.note: Alert for Crazy Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 23 at 2:32AM MDT until October 23 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring with areas of blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Crazy Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Recreation in the high country will be impacted by heavy wet snow and strong wind gusts. Travel and back country activities could be very difficult to impossible.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Hunters and outdoor recreationists should be prepared for difficult to dangerous winter conditions in the high country this weekend. Heavy wet snow will impede travel and cold windy conditions will produce a dangerous situation for those unprepared for the winter conditions.
